clean_data: IT Security Analyst span lITspan span lSecurityspan span lAnalystspan IT Security Analyst Rowland Heights CA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT Security Analyst ATT Entertainment Group El Segundo CA October 2015 to December 2016 Produced vulnerability reports for appropriate teams to address and remediate Validated PCIPayment Card Industry systems and documentation requirements to ensure that DIRECTV will obtain the annual PCI Report on Compliance Analyzed large data sets with the use of SQL to produce clean and reportable data for upper management review Coordinated with Project teams to ensure new assets being introduced into the network are clean and free of high critical vulnerabilities before going into the production Analyzed Firewall Change requests to ensure proper procedures and documentation Utilized Nexpose to actively scan DIRECTV systems to discover Vulnerabilities Enhanced the process of managing assets on the network using a Discovery Tool with the help of my team Utilized WhiteHat to scan external facing webservers such as Apache and IIS to detect and remediate vulnerabilities Utilized WhiteHat to also perform SAST and DAST on production applications Facilitated internal and external penetration testing Monitored eventsincidents within McAfee DLP solution ran scans and facilitated remediation IT Consultant Argyle Corp Walnut CA March 2013 to March 2014 Assembled configured upgraded Servers Workstations for rapid deployment Managed production Assets using management tools like Hypervisor and VSphere Created and deployed VMs Virtual Machines for clients Built RAID Arrays for Server redundancy Created custom images for client needs for rapid deployment of new systems Launched custom project that is able to push system images over the network to all systems connected simultaneously Repaired and upgraded client workstations Education Bachelors of Science in Business Administration California State Polytechnic University of Pomona Pomona CA January 2012 to June 2015
